title: 插件应用~~几个不会的问题~求助----麻烦各位大神们!悬赏76!谢谢了，答了就打赏人气...
author: Neon_Monkey
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Neon_Monkey 于 2014-2-27 19:54 编辑 

服务器半个正常的腐竹，可怜没有技术~啥都要自己搞……技术又不好TAT终于囤够了金粒~终于可以问问题了

{:10_512:}麻烦各位大神了，
只要帮了忙都谢了，人气回报!

1.怎么调某个世界的生物生成比例
（多少几率见到动物啊）
2.怎么把整个世界圈上地Residence
（或者怎么仅仅让玩家不能破坏地形）
（直接在GM调build false是不现实的，相当于不能交互，我主城需要signshop quickshop）
3.我的领地插件很不好用，麻烦调一下（麻烦调成普通玩家可以圈3个地，每个最大64*64，一格0.09）
（一个叫CEQ的组可以圈5个地，每个最大128*128，一格0.05）
4.怎么让RPGItem的掉落比例在某个世界取消
（能不能不用PerWorldPlugins禁用那个世界RPG）
5.怎么更改刷怪笼的刷怪速度，改怪物的掉落物品
（不用PerWorldPlugins还有其他的吗~我禁止了那个世界，因为其他世界都是速度0的无法刷怪）
附录领地插件config
麻烦了，谢谢{:10_492:}
真心感谢


[groupid=522]兔斯基大家族[/groupid]







config.txt

replies.author: mmmmmmmm丶浅瞳
replies.txt_content:
好了，我整理好了
禁止与任何物品互交
ESS自带有一个
GroupManger插件
打开他的配置文件夹
里面有一个worlds文件夹
再打开
找到里面有一个config.yml文件
用Notepad++这个软件打开

里面你会看到你的所有权限组。
找到不想让破坏方块的分组
然后找到分组中的build：true 这一项
把ture改为false

懂了没 = =、。
我果然不善于讲解。

replies.author: hjhjkjk
replies.txt_content:
Neon_Monkey 发表于 2014-2-27 12:34
楼主二货，不明白
麻烦指明一下
1.mv的config世界下的animal那个-1是什么，是默认吧
-1应该是不控制数量
应该是按百分比走的
比如将-1改成0.2就是20%
禁止交互的话我用InteractionControl
因为antibuild和banitem不知道为什么都不能禁止带有附加值的炉子
lore的话搜插件版是有的、是一个根据物品标签增加属性的插件
 带mod是什么？RPGitem2支持mod物品

replies.author: mmmmmmmm丶浅瞳
replies.txt_content:
好了  楼主  我已经给你做好教程了 仔细看好下面的啊。~~~
首先第一步，/plugins/Essentials/config.yml  用Notepad++打开

找到 
Essentials 建筑控制
这一大项下面有一个小项    # 玩家是否可以使用物品: 
    # 设置为 true 可以禁用那些没有权限玩家的使用物品
    # 设置为 false 将使 EssentialsAntiBuild 从不阻止玩家使用物品
    use: false复制代码第二步：/plugins/GroupManager/worlds/groups.yml
也用Notepad++打开
然后你会看到这些。  Builder:复制代码对 重点就在
build: false
这一项
把不想让破坏方块的分组设置成false即可。


然后 后台输入
/ess reload
/manload   
进行重载插件即可

replies.author: xenoxue
replies.txt_content:
1、无法调整生成比例，只能调整服务器生成动物的频率和最大上限。 调整方法：修改bukkit.yml

spawn-limits:   #生成最大上限   monsters: 70  #怪物数量   animals: 15 #动物数量   water-animals: 5 #水中动物数量   ambient: 15 #这个什么东西我不知道。

chunk-gc: #这个和主题没关系不要改   period-in-ticks: 600   load-threshold: 0 ticks-per: #生成频率   animal-spawns: 400  #动物生成 20=1秒，400=20秒   monster-spawns: 1 #怪物生成   autosave: 6000 #自动保存时间

复制代码2、这个简单，可以去插件区找我写的一个插件，叫做 mytown。 使用后整个世界都无法破坏，除非你在一个你拥有建筑权限的领地内。。 这个插件不禁止物品互交。很简单适用的一个小插件。 3、圈地插件的修改很容易的。。 修改Residence文件夹下的config文件。 找到 Groups: 后面的一大段代码都替换掉。 替换内容我写在下面。。 一直替换到 GroupAssignments: 之前。 替换代码：Default: #group name # Information about the Residence zone that the player can define. #Uncomment the lines below to mirror this config to other groups. #Mirror: #- 'group1' #- 'group2' Residence: # Determins if this group can create residences or not. This option can be overriden with the permissions node 'residence.create' CanCreate: true # The maximum number of Residences a player can have. MaxResidences: 3 # The maximum number of physical areas a residence can have. MaxAreasPerResidence: 2 # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X). MaxEastWest: 64 # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to South (Z). MaxNorthSouth: 64 # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, High to Low (Y). MaxUpDown: 255 # The lowest altitude this group is allowed to protect. MinHeight: 0 # The highest altitude this group is allowed to protect. MaxHeight: 255 # The maximum recursive depth that subzones can go. # A subzone within a subzone within the Residence zone would be a depth of 2. # Set to 0 to disable subzones. SubzoneDepth: 3 # Whether or not to allow teleporting to Residences. CanTeleport: true # Allow or Disallow the use of /res unstuck, to get yourself out of a residence if stuck in one somehow Unstuck: true # Allow or Disallow the use of the /res select command, if disabled they can only use the selection tool. SelectCommandAccess: true # Allow or Disallow the group to access the Blacklist/Ignorelist for residences they own. ItemListAccess: true # Options relating to enter and leave messages on the residence. Messaging: # Whether or not the player can change the Residence enter and leave messages. CanChange: true # The default enter message to apply to new Residences created by players in this group. # Leaving the message blank will disable it. DefaultEnter: Welcome %player to %residence, owned by %owner. # The default leave message to apply to new Residences created by players in this group. # Leaving the message blank will disable it. DefaultLeave: Now leaving %residence. # Options relating to the Lease system. Lease: # The maximum number of days to allow leases. MaxDays: 16 # The number of days to add to the lease following a '/res lease renew' command. RenewIncrement: 14 #Options related to the rent system Rent: #determines how many residences can be rented by players of this group at once MaxRents: 3 #determines how many residences can be set for rent by players of this group at once MaxRentables: 3 # Options relating to the Residence Economy. Economy: # Whether or not players in this group can buy other Residences that are for sale. CanBuy: true # Whether or not players in this group can sell their Residences. CanSell: false # Whether or not to ignore the Residence size/count limits when buying a residence. IgnoreLimits: false # The cost, per block, of making a new Residence or adding a area to it. BuyCost: 0.09 # The cost, per block, of renewing a Residence lease (if the lease system is enabled). RenewCost: 0.02 # Flags are checked in the order: # 1: Player # 2: Group # 3: Owner # 4: If all others are undefined, reverts to default value (usually true). # Flag permissions default to false. # These flags settings override the globals. Flags: # Specifically allow or deny this group from changing certain flags. Permission: #build: true # Specifys the flags that are applied at residence creation for players of this group. Default: #build: true # Specifys the flags that are applied at to the creator at residence creation. CreatorDefault: #build: true # Specifys the flags that are applied to other groups for this residence, at creation. GroupDefault: #default: #group name #build: false #these flags are applied specifically to this group whenever they are outside a residence #these flags will override the flags at the top, under the Global section. World: Global: #these flags will apply to all worlds #build: false WorldNameHere: #or you can apply them by each individual world #build: false CEQ: #group name # Information about the Residence zone that the player can define. #Uncomment the lines below to mirror this config to other groups. #Mirror: #- 'group1' #- 'group2' Residence: # Determins if this group can create residences or not. This option can be overriden with the permissions node 'residence.create' CanCreate: true # The maximum number of Residences a player can have. MaxResidences: 99 # The maximum number of physical areas a residence can have. MaxAreasPerResidence: 2 # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X). MaxEastWest: 128 # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to South (Z). MaxNorthSouth: 128 # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, High to Low (Y). MaxUpDown: 255 # The lowest altitude this group is allowed to protect. MinHeight: 0 # The highest altitude this group is allowed to protect. MaxHeight: 255 # The maximum recursive depth that subzones can go. # A subzone within a subzone within the Residence zone would be a depth of 2. # Set to 0 to disable subzones. SubzoneDepth: 3 # Whether or not to allow teleporting to Residences. CanTeleport: true # Allow or Disallow the use of /res unstuck, to get yourself out of a residence if stuck in one somehow Unstuck: true # Allow or Disallow the use of the /res select command, if disabled they can only use the selection tool. SelectCommandAccess: true # Allow or Disallow the group to access the Blacklist/Ignorelist for residences they own. ItemListAccess: true # Options relating to enter and leave messages on the residence. Messaging: # Whether or not the player can change the Residence enter and leave messages. CanChange: true # The default enter message to apply to new Residences created by players in this group. # Leaving the message blank will disable it. DefaultEnter: Welcome %player to %residence, owned by %owner. # The default leave message to apply to new Residences created by players in this group. # Leaving the message blank will disable it. DefaultLeave: Now leaving %residence. # Options relating to the Lease system. Lease: # The maximum number of days to allow leases. MaxDays: 16 # The number of days to add to the lease following a '/res lease renew' command. RenewIncrement: 14 #Options related to the rent system Rent: #determines how many residences can be rented by players of this group at once MaxRents: 3 #determines how many residences can be set for rent by players of this group at once MaxRentables: 3 # Options relating to the Residence Economy. Economy: # Whether or not players in this group can buy other Residences that are for sale. CanBuy: true # Whether or not players in this group can sell their Residences. CanSell: false # Whether or not to ignore the Residence size/count limits when buying a residence. IgnoreLimits: false # The cost, per block, of making a new Residence or adding a area to it. BuyCost: 0.05 # The cost, per block, of renewing a Residence lease (if the lease system is enabled). RenewCost: 0.02 # Flags are checked in the order: # 1: Player # 2: Group # 3: Owner # 4: If all others are undefined, reverts to default value (usually true). # Flag permissions default to false. # These flags settings override the globals. Flags: # Specifically allow or deny this group from changing certain flags. Permission: #build: true # Specifys the flags that are applied at residence creation for players of this group. Default: #build: true # Specifys the flags that are applied at to the creator at residence creation. CreatorDefault: #build: true # Specifys the flags that are applied to other groups for this residence, at creation. GroupDefault: #default: #group name #build: false #these flags are applied specifically to this group whenever they are outside a residence #these flags will override the flags at the top, under the Global section. World: Global: #these flags will apply to all worlds #build: false WorldNameHere: #or you can apply them by each individual world #build: false复制代码4、PerWorldPlugins可以让RPGitems在指定世界不掉落。但是无法阻止玩家把RPGitems生成的装备垮世界携带的。。 我是感觉没办法。。 5、其实我吐槽一个perworldplugins很不好用，会有各种问题。。 你说的这个我觉得也没什么好办法，除非你自己修改插件，添加一个所在世界的判断，然后读取配置文件，看看是否是在允许使用的列表。。 再不然就是用bungee。。多服务器插件。但是配置比较难，估计你弄不来。。

replies.author: 幻想天堂
replies.txt_content:
1:http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/nospawn/使用这个调整每个世界的动物和怪物生成数量
2：/mangdelp builder essentials.destroy  移除普通玩家破坏方块权限
    /mangdelp builder essentials.place    移除普通玩家放置方块权限
3：见附件
4：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-66774-1-1.html希望这个可以给你启示
5：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-197663-1-1.html用这个可以修改刷怪笼速度
